title: Advanced Mathematics Design Course Based on Online Blended Learning for Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: College-level foundational mathematics knowledge and practical application experience
context.additional_context: Designed for in-service professionals to apply learning content in real work settings, with BYOD compatibility across diverse devices.

learning_goals: Learners can design methods to apply advanced mathematical concepts to real-world tasks in online/blended environments.
Learners can utilize digital tools to facilitate effective interaction in Emergency Remote Teaching (ERT) contexts.
Learners can autonomously combine blended learning strategies tailored to their individual learning needs.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
